thread.title: BYU football video: Relive 5 key moments from the Cougars' fourth-quarter rally past Cincinnati
thread.title_full: BYU football video: Relive 5 key moments from the Cougars' fourth-quarter rally past Cincinnati | Deseret News

author: Brandon Judd
title: BYU football video: Relive 5 key moments from the Cougars' fourth-quarter rally past Cincinnati
text:
Here's a look at five plays that helped BYU turned a 24-17 deficit to start the fourth quarter into a 38-24 victory over Cincinnati on Friday night at LaVell Edwards Stadium.
Upcoming Games BYU Football BYU   Wagner @ BYU Lavell Edwards Stadium, Provo Oct. 24, 1:00 p.m. 7  Days   12  Hrs   29  Mins   15  Secs More Coverage BYU football: Bronson Kaufusi and the Cougar pass rush key in the Cougars' win over Cincinnati Harmon: Resilient BYU claws back to dispatch Cincinnati 38-24 Mangum pulls through with big second half for BYU BYU's defense, Mangum overcome slow start to rally (again) to beat Cincinnati, 38-24 PROVO â€” BYU is proving to be a fourth-quarter team in 2015, and that was true again Friday night as the Cougars rallied past Cincinnati 38-24 at LaVell Edwards Stadium with three final-period touchdowns.
BYU simply dominated the fourth quarter against the Bearcats, putting up 159 yards of total offense while holding Cincinnati to minus-7 yards. In addition to beating the Bearcats on both sides of the ball, the Cougars also won special teams in the fourth, courtesy of a Garrett Juergens 39-yard punt return that set up a clinching BYU score.
Here's a look at five key plays from the final period that were vital to the Cougar win.
